Narrativa gerada: Observation HRVInflammationCorrelationExample

Perfil: HRV-Inflammation Correlation Observation Profile

status: Final

category: Exam

code: HRV-Inflammation Correlation Assessment

subject: Patient Example Unknown, DoB: 1970-01-01 ( http://example.org/patients#example-patient)

effective: 2025-11-27 10:00:00+0000

note:

This assessment demonstrates the cholinergic anti-inflammatory pathway dysfunction. Lifestyle medicine intervention initiated: daily walking, mindfulness practice, sleep hygiene protocol.

hasMember:

  • CRP: 8.5 mg/L (elevated)
  • IL-6: 12.5 pg/mL (elevated)

component

code: Correlation coefficient

value: -0.28 1 (Detalhes: UCUM código1 = '1')

component

code: Clinical interpretation

value: Inverse correlation confirmed: Low HRV associated with elevated inflammatory markers (CRP 8.5, IL-6 12.5). Pattern consistent with reduced vagal anti-inflammatory regulation.

component

code: Trend direction

value: Patient's condition worsened
